body.p: There is an SVN (Subversion) Client application embedded in . You may start it from the Tools menu and use it for synchronizing your working copy with a central repository.

Another way of starting it is by using the contextual menu of the Project tree: Team Open in SVN Client . This action displays Syncro SVN Client and shows the selected project file in the Working Copy view.
